item.description:
Annual Food Drive Fundraiser/Dancing to World Premier Band

Join us for a great cause and a fun night of dancing to the The World Premier Band. Each year we collect and donate non-perishable items for "The St.Joseph's food pantry". Hundreds of people usually attend this and bring thousands of dollars worth of food for those in need!!

I've volunteered for this event for the past 4 years and have had a GREAT time! World Premier is an outstanding dance band (and one of my favorites) so you won't want to miss this one!

This year, the event is returning back to it's original venue (with a parking garage right across the street) - formerly known as Club 58, now known as the South Shore Music Hall!

Your hostess:

TICKETS ARE NOW AVAILABLE!

Members are responsible for purchasing their own ticket.

$20 per ticket!

By Paypal to: perryp21t@comcast.net

Reserve by Phone or Email:

Call Perry: 781-492-5349 or781-963-2691

Email Perry: perryp21t@comcast.net

 

This event is posted in several meetup groups so please only RSVP in one group!

Check out World Premier in action!  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=W28GwwryeBg

 

(Thanks Deb for letting me invite Funseekers to this event!) :)
item.how_to_find_us: Details to be sent to "YES" RSVP's.
item.name: Annual Food Drive/Fundraiser Featuring "World Premier Band" - Quincy
